comprehensive_overview: Conda-env is a command-line tool that allows users to create, export, list, remove, and update conda environments. Conda is an open-source package management system and environment management system that runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
core_features: 1. Create new conda environments. 2. Export and share conda environments. 3. List existing conda environments. 4. Remove conda environments. 5. Update conda environments with new packages.
